data.name: Botanical TD
data.detailed_description:
Defend against incoming monsters with a variety of plants. It's up to you to choose the best towers in each level and develope the ultimate tactics. Monsters come with different stats and get stronger over time.
What makes this Tower Defense special are the power-ups for enemies YOU have to choose.

Build and upgrade towers!

  • 7 unique towers: - You build towers all over the map finding the best positions for an effective defense. Combine their strengths to make them even stronger.
  • 5 upgradable levels: - Upgrade towers to their max level of 5.

Defend against strong enemies!

  • 5 different monsters: - Fight against monsters with different size, speed and health.
  • 6 special power-ups: - Every few waves you choose one out of three random power-ups for monsters.


Test your tactical ability in different game modes

  • 2 different game modes: Destroy Crystals (easy/hard) and Endless Mode

data.short_description: Defend against monsters with a variety of plants in this Tower Defense. Monsters are getting stronger and stronger and you have to choose their power-ups!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 VRAM (4GB) or AMD Radeon RX 470
